be_first: Be the first to reach this ranking and inspire others to achieve new heights.
full_energy_desc: Fills the energy scale to maximum, without waiting
turbo_mining_desc: x2 faster energy recovery for 2 hours
multitap_desc: x2 for coins per tap for 1 hour
mining_desc: x2 for coins per hour for 1.5 hours
channel_desc:
All major news about the project will be published there. Keep up to date
 with the latest information
daily_reward_desc:
Pick up coins for logging into the game daily without skipping. The “Pick up” button must be
 pressed
 daily, otherwise the day count will start again
no_invited_friends: You don't have any invited friends yet. Send your link to your contacts to get bonuses from Clyde
